Package crewManagement

Class Crew

  • java.lang.Object
    • crewManagement.Crew
  • public class Crew
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Medic type of crew member.
    Author:
    Jason Smit, Ariel Evangelista

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void createCrew​(java.util.List<javax.swing.JTextField> crewNames, java.util.List<javax.swing.JComboBox<java.lang.Object>> crewTypes, int size)
      Creates and adds crew members to the crew array based off the users selected crew names and crew types.
      int getAlive()
      Returns the number of crew members alive
      int getAllMoves()
      Returns the number of all actions remaining for the crew
      java.util.ArrayList<CrewMember> getCrew()
      Get the list of current crew members
      static Crew getInstance()
      The unique instance of Crew class
      void newDay()
      Will apply certain effects after new day is called Hunger: Increases by 20 (max 100) Infected: Decreases health by 30 Hunger at 100%: Decreases health by 10 Tiredness at 100%: Moves deducted by 1
      void resetCrewMoves()
      Will call resetMoves method for each crew member.
      int size()
      Returns the current number of crews

      • createCrew

        public void createCrew​(java.util.List<javax.swing.JTextField> crewNames,
                       java.util.List<javax.swing.JComboBox<java.lang.Object>> crewTypes,
                       int size)
        Creates and adds crew members to the crew array based off the users selected crew names and crew types.
        Parameters:
        crewNames - A List containing the JTextField's that hold the names for each crew memeber.
        crewTypes - A List containing the JComboBox's that hold the types for each crew member.
        size - The size of the crew

        The list of current crew members

      • resetCrewMoves

        public void resetCrewMoves()
        Will call resetMoves method for each crew member.

      • newDay

        public void newDay()
        Will apply certain effects after new day is called Hunger: Increases by 20 (max 100) Infected: Decreases health by 30 Hunger at 100%: Decreases health by 10 Tiredness at 100%: Moves deducted by 1

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the current number of crews
        Returns:
        Returns the size of crew

      • getAllMoves

        public int getAllMoves()
        Returns the number of all actions remaining for the crew

      • getAlive

        public int getAlive()
        Returns the number of crew members alive
        Returns:
        The number of crew members still alive
